name: .XCU File Extension
summary: Learn about .XCU files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Apache OpenOffice, an open source office productivity suite; contains configuration information for an add-on in an XML format; commonly used to configure OpenOffice office extensions.

content: XCU files can be included as part of an .OXT extension file. They define configuration information such as menu labels, default values for document templates, and other extension parameters.
NOTE: OpenOffice.org was replaced by Apache OpenOffice in 2012.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
